definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
hatred/animosity/enmity/foe/enemy/to feel animosity toward (the wealthy, foreigners etc)

sentences.english: Mr. Cai described the film as a revenge story.
sentences.chinese: 蔡尚君將本片描述成一部復仇片。

sentences.english: As expected, Marvel Studios has assembled the Avengers.
sentences.chinese: 跟預期一樣，驚奇漫畫工作室召集了衆多《復仇者》。

sentences.english: Break into Riddler's secret hideout and exact your revenge.
sentences.chinese: 闖入謎語人的隱祕藏身所，實現你的復仇。

sentences.english: The cruel revenge of a woman is to remain faithful to a man.
sentences.chinese: 女子最嚴酷的復仇方式，是對一個男人一直保持貞忠。

sentences.english: Heathcliff was the well-known revenger in the novel Wuthering Heights written by Emily Bronte.
sentences.chinese: 勃郎特小說《呼嘯山莊》中衆所周知的一位復仇者。

sentences.english: Finally, there is the revengeful anger.
The artistic technique of ghost revenge is adopted to express the author's ideal to the world.
sentences.chinese: 鬼魂復仇的藝術手法表現了作者的治世理想。

sentences.english: The Prince was PageRankeoccupied with revenge.
Medea tells the story of the jealousy and revenge of a woman betrayed by her husband.
sentences.chinese: “美迪亞”講述了一個被丈夫拋棄的女人復仇的故事。

sentences.english: Whatever the truth, Malak survived, and returned with a vengeance.
sentences.chinese: 無論真相如何，馬拉克倖存下來，並帶着復仇回來了。

sentences.english: Seal of Vengeance damage over time effect duration increased to 18 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 復仇聖印的持續傷害效果持續提高爲18秒。

sentences.english: My heart bleeds. But revenge is in the creator's hands.
sentences.chinese: 我的心在滴血，但是，復仇一事乃操之於上帝之手。

sentences.english: There are few things quite as sweet as revenge.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎沒有比復仇更爽的事情了。

sentences.english: Nemesis, the goddess of measure and not of revenge, keeps watch.
sentences.chinese: 正義而非復仇女神尼彌米西斯，向來忠於職守。

sentences.english: The English people will not delay in avenging me.
sentences.chinese: 英國人是不會推遲對我的復仇的。

sentences.english: Modern penological thought discounts retribution in the sense of vengeance.
sentences.chinese: 近代刑罰學思想把報應的意義限定爲復仇。

definition: to hide (as an undercover agent)/an insider (in a gang of thieves)/a mole
